summary: A pianist who loses his hands in a plane crash receives the transplanted hands of an executed criminal but his new hands have the murderous tendencies of their previous owner.
cast: Mel Ferrer|Christopher Lee|Dany Carrel|Lucile Saint-Simon|Felix Aylmer|Basil Sydney|Donald Wolfit|Peter Reynolds|Campbell Singer|Donald Pleasence|Yanilou|David Peel|Anita Sharp-Bolster|Gertan Klauber|Edouard Hemme|Mireille Perrey|Walter Randall|Arnold Diamond|Janina Faye|Manning Wilson|Antoine Balpêtré|Franca Bellj|Peter Bennett|Ernest Blyth|Jean Combal|Fred Davis|Pierre Ferrari|Andrée Florence|Jean Fountaine|Charles Gilliard|Victor Harrington|Juba Kennerley|Aileen Lewis|George Merritt|John More|Richard Neller|Terry Sartain|John Smart|Emile Stemmler|Philip Stewart|Fred Stroud|John Tatham|John Timberlake|Johnny Wyne
keywords: psychotronic film|surgery|reference to ludwig van beethoven|reference to franz liszt|reference to claude debussy
title: La manos de Orlac
